title: A Labor Day Hooray
description: "It's on the first Monday of every September.""It's a day for workers to relax.""This day is fun to remember."Labor Day is here! A dog invites children to celebrate with him. He explains what Labor Day means to him and why we should all celebrate. This book features a fun look at illustrated dog characters performing some important common jobs. This book has a rhyming style which is sure to engage children during storytimes and read alouds.Visit the Author Page www.Deesignery.com
author: Dee Smith
